title: I Don't Love You But I Want To Sleep With You
alternative_title: Suki janai kedo; Daite kudasai ; 好きじゃないけど、抱いてください ; 좋아하지 않지만 안아주세요
status: Suki janai kedo; Daite kudasai ; 好きじゃないけど、抱いてください ; 좋아하지 않지만 안아주세요
description:
Description :
        Oh no... if he moves his hand like that, I'll...!"Rio Kasugai, an office worker with a knack for fortune-telling, reluctantly does a love fortune for her boss, Shinya Fukamachi, whom she really can't stand. That night, she has a startling dream of her...having s** with him?! This dream makes her hyper-aware of him, and she finds it hard to contain the heat of arousal building within her. Then, one evening after work, the two find themselves getting close, leading to...?! Buckle up for a wild ride of romance, mystery, and suspense with a headstrong office worker and her snide boss!
